title: Frontline reviews, payments, & referrals in a tap - Y Combinator
snippet: Dylan Allen is the CEO & Founder of Cheers. Previously, Dylan interned at Microsoft Azure and other Utah-based B2B Tech companies as a product manager & software engineer. Dylan graduated from BYU with a degree in computer science, and originally hails from Dallas, Texas.

title: Dylan Allen - Crunchbase Person Profile
snippet: He is a founder and CEO of Cheers. He completed his education at Brigham Young University.

title: Cheers - Founders and Board of Directors - Tracxn
Cheers - Company Profile - Tracxn
snippet: Cheers - Providing platforms to solicit and analyze feedback from customers. Raised a total funding of $500K over 1 round from 1 investor. Founded by Dylan Allen in the year 2024. Cheers has 817 competitors.

title: Cheers - Revolutionizing In-Person Business Interactions
snippet: Cheers Reviews Inc. transforms in-person businesses with NFC-enabled badges, tracking referrals, reviews, feedback, and tips at the doorstep. Managers get actionable insights to boost operations and growth. Backed by YC, we modernize workforce management.

title: Cheers (YC S24) : p/cheers-6 | Product Hunt
snippet: Cheers revolutionizes in-person work with NFC-enabled employee badges. Simplify key tasks like gathering reviews and verifying employment—all with a tap. Cheers is the super-app for in-person business success and growth. Cheers to seamless interactions! 🥂 See launch → 69 206 Add a comment Login to comment Replies Best Dylan Allen Cheers ...
